overview: "I am Eric": with this message written on city walls and posts, street artist Eric introduces himself and draws attention to himself and his work. It is necessary to stop just beyond the 30 seconds of red light to realize that the phrase sums up your philosophy and your lifestyle. The short film "I prefer that I swear" accompanies the artist in the headlights to show the complexity behind his good mood.
title: Prefiro que me Xinguem
